e-commerce.title: Next.js E-Commerce Website
e-commerce.summary: E-commerce design; product listing, detail, cart and checkout pages.
e-commerce.content:
Features:
- Product listing, detail, cart and checkout pages.
- Responsive design and basic interactions.
- Starter template for e-commerce projects.

crypto-tracker.title: Crypto Tracker – Prices & Market
crypto-tracker.summary: Coin tracking panel with Next.js; responsive UI and basic charts.
crypto-tracker.content:
Features:
- Coin listing and detail view.
- Mobile-friendly UI and fast search.
- Chart/analytics foundation to extend.

piton-intern.title: Internship Website
piton-intern.content:
Content:
- Website prepared for internship application.
- Coded from the provided Figma example.

book-store.title: E-Commerce: Book-Store
book-store.summary: Book e-commerce with Next.js + Tailwind; SWR, Axios, JWT, Docker.
book-store.content:
Features:
- Category filtering, horizontal scroll list.
- Data layer with SWR + Axios, JWT-ready structure.
- Dark/Light theme, responsive design.
- UI for Admin/Seller roles (design).

nextjs-contact-page.title: Next.js Contact Page
nextjs-contact-page.summary: Simple yet elegant contact page; Next.js + Tailwind.
nextjs-contact-page.content:
Features:
- Form components and validation skeleton.
- Clean design with visuals/icons.
- Easily pluggable to projects.
